FMOD Plugin Guide¶


HyperealVR FMOD Audio Spatializer Plugin Guide¶

  1. To install and enable the plugin in FMOD Studio, please copy/extract HyprealAudioFMODPlugin.dll to FMODStudioDir\plugins. Please make sure that you've installed Hypereal runtime.
  2. In FMOD Studio, create a new event.
  3. Select the Master Track.
  4. Delete the 3D Panner.
  5. Add the Hypereal Audio Plugin for FMOD.
